author: Tamara Hardingham-Gill, CNN
title: Are billionaires really self-isolating on superyachts?
description: When entertainment mogul David Geffen shared an image of his superyacht "Rising Sun" at sea alongside the caption "isolated in the Grenadines" last month, it's fair to say the post ruffled a few feathers.
content:
(CNN) When entertainment mogul David Geffen shared an image of his superyacht "Rising Sun" at sea alongside the caption "isolated in the Grenadines" last month, it's fair to say the post ruffled a few feathers.
However well-meaning his message may have been … [+8203 chars]
